name: Kevin Coleman
what_you_do: Talks.co provides podcast guest matching and booking services, helping users connect with quality podcast hosts and guests to grow their audience and authority through podcast interviews.
who_you_serve: Talks.co serves podcasters, personal brands, and coaches looking to enhance their visibility and networking opportunities through podcasting.
bio: 4.9/5 user rating from over 2,000 users, 50K+ connections, and 3.9x visibility increase for Pro members.
business_focus: Talks.co provides podcast guest matching and booking services, helping users connect with quality podcast hosts and guests to grow their audience and authority through podcast interviews. (podcasting)
